name: Maududi
text: Ya'. Sin.

name: Maududi
text: By the Wise Qur'an,

name: Maududi
text: you are truly among the Messengers,

name: Maududi
text: on a Straight Way,

name: Maududi
text: (and this Qur'an) is a revelation from the Most Mighty, the Most Compassionate

name: Maududi
text: so that you may warn a people whose ancestors were not warned before wherefore they are heedless.

name: Maududi
text: Surely most of them merit the decree of chastisement; so they do not believe.

name: Maududi
text: We have put fetters around their necks which reach up to their chins so that they are standing with their heads upright,

name: Maududi
text: and We have put a barrier before them and a barrier behind them, and have covered them up, so they are unable to see.

name: Maududi
text: It is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them for they shall not believe.

name: Maududi
text: You can warn only him who follows the Admonition and fears the Merciful Lord without seeing Him. Give such a one good tidings of forgiveness and a generous reward.

name: Maududi
text: We shall surely raise the dead to life and We record what they did and the traces of their deeds that they have left behind. We have encompassed that in a Clear Book.

name: Maududi
text: Recite to them, as a case in point, the story of the people of the town when the Messengers came to them.

name: Maududi
text: We sent to them two Messengers and they rejected both of them as liars. Then We strengthened them with a third (Messenger).

name: Maududi
text: They said: “We have been sent to you as Messengers.” The people of the town said: “You are only human beings like ourselves, and the Merciful Lord has revealed nothing. You are simply lying.”

name: Maududi
text: The Messengers said: “Our Lord knows that we have indeed been sent to you

name: Maududi
text: and our duty is no more than to clearly convey the Message.”

name: Maududi
text: The people of the town said: “We believe you are an evil omen for us. If you do not desist, we will stone you or you will receive a grievous chastisement from us.”

name: Maududi
text: The Messengers replied: “Your evil omen is with you. (Are you saying this) because you were asked to take heed? The truth is that you are a people who have exceeded all bounds.”

name: Maududi
text: In the meantime a man came running from the far end of the town, saying: “My people, follow the Messengers;

name: Maududi
text: follow those who do not ask any recompense from you and are rightly-guided.

name: Maududi
text: Why should I not serve the One Who created me and to Whom all of you shall be sent back?

name: Maududi
text: What! Shall I take any deities apart from Him whose intercession will not avail me the least were the Merciful One to bring any adversity upon me, nor will they be able to rescue me?

name: Maududi
text: Surely in that case I should indeed be in evident error.

name: Maududi
text: I believe in your Lord; so listen to me.”

name: Maududi
text: (Eventually they killed him and he was told): “Enter Paradise.” The man exclaimed: “Would that my people knew

name: Maududi
text: for what reason Allah has forgiven me and placed me among the honoured ones.”

name: Maududi
text: After him, We did not send down any hosts from the heaven; We stood in no need to send down any host.

name: Maududi
text: There was but a single Blast and suddenly they became silent and still.

name: Maududi
text: Alas for My servants! Never does a Messenger come to them but they mock him.

name: Maududi
text: Have they not seen how many nations before them did We destroy? Thereafter they never came back to them.

name: Maududi
text: All of them shall (one day) be gathered before Us.

name: Maududi
text: Let the dead earth be a Sign for them. We gave it life and produced from it grain whereof they eat.

name: Maududi
text: We made in it gardens of date-palms and vines, and We caused springs to gush forth

name: Maududi
text: that they might eat of its fruits. It was not their hands that made them. Will they not, then, give thanks?

name: Maududi
text: Holy is He Who created all things in pairs, whether it be of what the earth produces, and of themselves, and of what they do not know.

name: Maududi
text: And the night is another Sign for them. We strip the day from it and they become plunged in darkness.

name: Maududi
text: The sun is running its course to its appointed place. That is the ordaining of the All-Mighty, the All-Knowing.

name: Maududi
text: We have appointed stages for the moon till it returns in the shape of a dry old branch of palm-tree.

name: Maududi
text: Neither does it lie in the sun's power to overtake the moon nor can the night outstrip the day. All glide along, each in its own orbit.

name: Maududi
text: Another Sign for them is that We carried all their offspring in the laden vessel

name: Maududi
text: and then created for them other vessels like those on which they ride.

name: Maududi
text: Should We so wish, We can drown them, and there will be none to heed their cries of distress, nor will they be rescued.

name: Maududi
text: It is only Our Mercy (that rescues them) and enables enjoyment of life for a while.

name: Maududi
text: When it is said to such people: “Guard yourselves against what is ahead of you and what has preceded you that mercy be shown to you” (they pay scant heed to it).

name: Maududi
text: Never does any Sign of their Lord come to them, but they turn away from it.

name: Maududi
text: And when it is said to them: “Spend (in the Way of Allah) out of the sustenance that Allah has provided you,” the unbelievers say to the believers: “Shall we feed him whom, Allah would have fed, had He so wished?” Say: “You are in evident error.”

name: Maududi
text: They say: “When will this threat (of Resurrection) come to pass? Tell us if indeed you are truthful.”

name: Maududi
text: The Truth is that they are waiting for nothing but a mighty Blast to seize them the while they are disputing (in their worldly affairs),

name: Maududi
text: and they will not even be able to make a testament, nor to return to their households.

name: Maududi
text: Then the Trumpet shall be blown and lo! they will come out of their graves and be on the move towards their Lord,

name: Maududi
text: (nervously) exclaiming. “Alas for us! Who roused us out of our sleeping-place?” “This is what the Merciful One had promised, and what (His) Messengers had said was true.”

name: Maududi
text: Then there will simply be one single Blast, and all will have gathered before Us.

name: Maududi
text: Today no one shall suffer the least injustice, and you shall not be recompensed except according to your deeds.

name: Maududi
text: Indeed, the people of Paradise will be busy enjoying themselves:

name: Maududi
text: they and their spouses shall be reclining on their couches in shady groves;

name: Maududi
text: therein there will be all kinds of fruits to eat, and they shall have all that they desire.

name: Maududi
text: “Peace” shall be the word conveyed to them from their Merciful Lord.

name: Maududi
text: “Criminals, separate yourselves from others today!

name: Maududi
text: Children of Adam, did I not command you not to serve Satan -- he is to you an open enemy

name: Maududi
text: and serve Me alone: this is the Straight Way?

name: Maududi
text: Still, he misguided a whole throng of you. Did you have no sense?

name: Maududi
text: Now this is the Hell of which you were warned.

name: Maududi
text: Burn in it on account of your disbelieving.

name: Maududi
text: Today We shall put a seal on their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us and their feet shall bear witness to what they had been doing.

name: Maududi
text: If We so willed, We would have put out their eyes, then they would rush to see the Way, but how would they be able to see?

name: Maududi
text: If We so willed, We would have transformed them where they were so that they would not go forward or backward.

name: Maududi
text: Whomsoever We grant a long life, We reverse him in his constitution. Do they still not understand?

name: Maududi
text: We did not teach him (to wit, the Messenger) poetry and it does not behove him. This is none but an Admonition, and a Clear Book

name: Maududi
text: that he may warn him who is alive and establish an argument against those that deny the Truth.

name: Maududi
text: Do they not see Our handiwork: We created for them cattle which they own?

name: Maududi
text: We have subjected the cattle to them so that some of them they ride and eat the flesh of others.

name: Maududi
text: They derive a variety of benefits and drinks from them. Will they, then, not give thanks?

name: Maududi
text: They set up deities apart from Allah, hoping that they will receive help from them.

name: Maududi
text: Those deities can render them no help. Yet these devotees act as though they were an army in waiting for them.

name: Maududi
text: Let not their words grieve you. Surely We know all things about them, what they conceal and what they reveal.

name: Maududi
text: Does man not see that We created him of a sperm drop, and lo! he is flagrantly contentious?

name: Maududi
text: He strikes for Us a similitude and forgot his own creation. He says: “Who will quicken the bones when they have decayed?”

name: Maududi
text: Say: “He Who first brought them into being will quicken them; He knows well about every kind of creation;

name: Maududi
text: He Who created from a green tree a fire for you, a fire to light your stoves with.”

name: Maududi
text: Has He Who created the heavens and the earth no power to create the likes of them? Yes, indeed, He is the Superb Creator.

name: Maududi
text: Whenever He wills a thing, He just commands it “Be” and it is.

name: Maududi
text: Holy is He Who has full control over everything, and to Him you shall all be recalled.
